articles.title: Adani Wilmar share price crashes: Check latest on NSE, BSE - India Today
articles.description: Adani Wilmar's share price on BSE was down by 4.99 per cent or 30.65 points at Rs 583.25.

articles.title: Desperate for coal, India's metal makers hunt for fuel overseas - Economic Times

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India's inflation likely accelerated to an 18-month high of 7.5% in April: Reuters poll - Economic Times
articles.description: The surge has been long anticipated following the Indian government's decision to wait until after key state elections in March to hike fuel prices. Energy prices globally have soared since Russia's invasion of Ukraine in late February.
articles.content: India's retail inflation likely surged to an 18-month high in April, largely driven by rising fuel and food prices and staying well above the Reserve Bank of India's upper tolerance limit for a fourt… [+2214 chars]

articles.title: HDFC increases home loan interest rates - Economic Times
articles.description: Housing Development Finance Corporation (HDFC) has increased its Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) on Housing Loans by 30 basis points, effective May 9, 2022.
